channel.title: My experiences with Salvia
channel.description:
Holy fuck.
Just a summation: That's basically what I've got to say. I tried 1g of 20x the second time (the first time I did .25g of 40x, but I didn't trip out as much as this time) and I thought I went psycho. Shit turned all cartoony and I thought everything was fake so I got up and tried running to the door to escape, but ran back to the couch because I thought "what if this is real? I'd look like a fucking retard"... So I sat back down and chilled for a while. A lot of things happened that I can't quite remember, I thought my friend was on fire and my other friend was having a seizure when he took a hit.
Perhaps I should try sketching some of the things I saw, if I could remember.
The more you talk the more you trip... and I talked the whole time (Which was over 20min)
By the way, I have videos. I'm considering posting them up on the internetz.
(I'll probably fix up this post/add more to it when I have time)
edit: Ah, my memory hit me... I believe I pictured people looking like some Photoshop feature I liked. (But extended) Before: [img]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/3641/groupdy0.jpg[/img] After: [img]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/48/group1se1.jpg[/img]

item.title: My experiences with Salvia
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:18, topic:206950”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=272829.msg2236669#msg2236669 date=1211439580]
Some people have respect.
[/quote]

His excuse for not doing it was “I would get very very beaten”…[/quote]Yeah, hence why I mentioned ‘some people’, I referred to me there as well. As I’m not posting anything until I get permission from my friend.

Read full topic

item.title: My experiences with Salvia
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“SonGoku, post:10, topic:206950”]Salvia is a weird drug. Either it affects you horribly, or you dont feel anything at all. I remember my first time trying it. Didnt go cartoony, lasted all of 10 minutes. I felt very closed in though for some reason.

But upload it ;)[/quote]

I’ve had plenty of amazing experiences with it. It doesn’t have to go horible at all.

Read full topic

item.title: My experiences with Salvia
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

Salvia is a weird drug. Either it affects you horribly, or you dont feel anything at all. I remember my first time trying it. Didnt go cartoony, lasted all of 10 minutes. I felt very closed in though for some reason.

But upload it

item.description:

[quote=“la­wl, post:6, topic:206950”][quote]
Should I upload videos for the world to see me and my friends retarded?
[/quote]

yes, and you should also upload the video of you on salvia[/quote]

Wow,that gave me a good laugh.

item.title: My experiences with Salvia
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

I did about .5g of 20x, and I felt nothing like that (yes, I smoked it right, with a butane torch, etc). I knew everything was real, but I laughed extremely hard. I was laughing for 5-10 minutes for no reason at all. It was the kind of laughter I had on the first time I tried weed, but much more hardcore.

Read full topic

item.title: My experiences with Salvia
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Yep, upload it. I want to see the effects.

Read full topic
